backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling user profiles, registrations with document blobs, OTP, and admin access control with persistent maps.
backend/migration.mo: State migration module copying old actor fields to the new structure without transformation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend admin files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of all major frontend files used for registration and admin features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions with light/dark palettes and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading fonts and mounting the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level view switcher between splash screen, registration flow, and admin panel with remount logic.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Animated splash screen with reduced-motion support and skip option triggering onComplete.
frontend/src/features/admin/AdminPanel.t: Main admin interface handling authentication, admin claiming, registration list/detail display, editing, and deletion workflows.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/A: Provides UI for admins to regain access via setup code or username/password login, handling loading, errors, and success states.
Error boundary that catches rendering errors in admin detail views and shows a retry option.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/D: Displays document images with loading, error handling, and retry logic, with a placeholder when no blob is provided.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/E: Form allowing admins to edit registration details with change detection, validation, and save/cancel handling.
frontend/src/features/admin/components/R: Shows detailed information for a selected registration with states for empty, loading, error, viewing, and admin actions.
frontend/src/features/admin/hooks/useAdm: React Query mutation for admin password login that normalizes backend errors and refreshes admin-related data on success.
Provides React Query hooks for admin actions including role checks, registration fetching, and resilient receipt-aware registration retrieval.
Handles applying an admin setup code, updating session state, and invalidating admin-related queries.
frontend/src/features/registration/compo: Error boundary component that displays a fallback UI and reload option when a registration step fails.
frontend/src/features/registration/hooks: Defines mutations for OTP generation, OTP verification, and full registration submission with file-to-blob conversion.
frontend/src/features/registration/Regis: Implements the multi-step registration UI flow with validation-driven navigation and step components.
frontend/src/features/registration/steps: Customer details form step with validation, error tracking, and controlled state updates.
Handles OTP generation, verification, and triggers final registration submission with success UI.
Displays terms and conditions with print-friendly proof and tracks user agreement to emit validation with a timestamp.
Handles Aadhaar, PAN, and optional payment receipt uploads with previews and triggers validation updates only when input changes.
frontend/src/features/registration/terms: Defines structured terms and conditions sections for router and service policies.
frontend/src/features/registration/types: Declares TypeScript interfaces for customer details, document uploads, and step props.
frontend/src/features/registration/valid: Validates customer details including required fields, phone format, age check, email, and address length.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and enabling login and logout flows.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles including theme variables, dark mode, print styles, and splash screen visuals.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, fonts, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the appâ€™s registration flow, admin features, issues, and architectural notes.
